svg.text: // ARCHITECTURE — "PALMS ARE SWEATY, CODE IS READY"

g.text: "Write a LinkedIn post about our AI Collaboration Suite v3.0 launch"
WAVE 1 CONTEXT PASSED TO WAVE 2 VIA AgentContext

text.tspan: Generates platform-specific content: hook → body → CTA → hashtags. Saves drafts via MCP Filesystem.

g.text: "You better never let it go — you only get one shot at the first draft."

text.tspan: Initial review → metacognitive reflection → revised compliance score (1-10).

g.text: The AI that reviews its own AI. No moment to lose yourself.
Not sequential. Parallel. Like a real team.
